因應於10月6日可能發生的公眾活動，有潛在風險，為顧及顧客、商戶及員工的安全及審慎起見，德福廣場將於10月6日全日暫停營業，而商場各出入口及停車場亦會關閉。不便之處，敬請原諒。

In view of possible public order events that might be held on 6 October 2019, as a prudent measure, Telford Plaza will be closed on 6 October 2019 to protect the safety of our customers, tenants and staff. All mall entrances and car parks will be closed. We apologize for any inconvenience that this may cause.
